menuitem.name: Insertar fila _arriba
menuitem.enabled: (dw.getActiveWindow(true) != null && dw.getActiveWindow(true).allowsEdits()) && dw.getDocumentDOM() != null && dw.getDocumentDOM().getParseMode() == 'html' && dw.getDocumentDOM().canInsertTableRows() && !(dw.getDocumentDOM().isTableLocked()) &&!(dw.getDocumentDOM().getCCSharedSetting_TextOnlyInNonTemplates())
